body:
Binge Philic is a streaming service that offers a wide variety of award-winning TV programmes, films, anime, documentaries and more – on thousands of internet-connected devices.

You can watch as much as you want, whenever you want, without a single advert – all for one low monthly price. There's always something new to discover, and new TV programmes and films are added every week!

header: How much does Binge Philic cost?
body: Watch Binge Philic on your smartphone, tablet, smart TV, laptop or streaming device, all for one low fixed monthly fee. Plans start from Rs 2 a month. No extra costs or contracts.

Watch anywhere, anytime, on an unlimited number of devices. Sign in with your Binge Philic account to watch instantly on the web at BingePhilic.com from your personal computer or on any internet-connected device that offers theBinge Philic app, including smart TVs, smartphones, tablets, streaming media players and game consoles.

You can also download your favourite programmes with the iOS, Android, or Windows 10 app. Use downloads to watch while you're on the go and without an internet connection. Take Netflix with you anywhere.

Binge Philic is flexible. There are no annoying contracts and no commitments. You can easily cancel your account online in two clicks. There are no cancellation fees – start or stop your account at any time.

header: What can I watch on Binge Philic?
body: Binge Philic has an extensive library of feature films, documentaries, TV programmes, anime, award-winning Binge Philic originals, and more. Watch as much as you want, any time you want.

header: What is the motive for the Binge Philic ?
body: Binge Philic is a Mini Project just for educational purposes. It mainly aids for the study of responsive Web App using React ,Payment Gateways and Cloud Firestore.Enjoy the little clips made for this project :-)
